help:
Bot commands:
/help - help.
/spin - spin the wheel.
/wins - wins.
/top - top winners.
/get - view set emojis and phrases.
/set - set custom emojis and winning phrases.
Example: /set üçí:Cherry. üçã:Lemon. üçè:Apple. üçÜ:Eggplant.
Telegram Premium emojis are not supported.
DEV functions:
/ttt - tic-tac-toe.
/chess - chess. (*VERY GLITCHY*)
active_spin: You are already spinning the wheel. Please wait for the current spin to finish.
invalid_set_format: Invalid format! Use exactly 4 pairs of emojis and phrases (end each pair with a period) in the format: /set üçí:Cherry. üçã:Lemon. üçè:Apple. üçÜ:Eggplant.
wait: Waiting for the player for noughts.
incorrect_join0: You cannot join the game as
incorrect_join1: if you are already playing as
unavailable: Only the session creator can select the game parameters.
description_0_3: To win, you need to line up 3 symbols in a row.
description_0: To win, you need to line up 4 symbols in a row.
description_1:
Fun mode)))
To win, you need to line up 4 symbols in any way.
description_2:
3 symbols in a row - 1 point.
4 symbols in a row - instant win.
In case of a tie, points are counted.
